What is the Best Way to Pay for Solar?
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Everyone is different, so there’s no single best way to pay for solar. There are several options you can choose from, and each option offers its own unique advantages.
All of the options offer both immediate and long-term savings. And all 3 allow you to reduce your carbon footprint.
Let’s explore each option. You can decide what works best for you, your budget, and your financial goals.
